title: Citi First Quarter 2012 Earnings Review
summary: New York - Citigroup will issue its first quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (Eastern) on Monday, April 16, 2012. At 11 a.m. (Eastern), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-2: New York – Citigroup will issue its first quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (Eastern) on Monday, April 16, 2012. At 11 a.m. (Eastern), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The press release, webcast and presentation materials will be available at http://www.citigroup.com/citi/fin. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available at http://www.citigroup.com/citi/fin/pres.htm.
tag-4: To dial-in to the live teleconference, please call (866) 516-9582 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (973) 409-9210 (for international callers). Conference code: 55701551. A telephonic replay of the call will be available beginning approximately two hours after the event until Monday, April 30, 2012, by calling (855) 859-2056 (U.S. and Canada callers) or (404) 537-3406 (for international callers). Conference code: 55701551.
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-6: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://new.citi.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
